creator: janis@itr.no
text:
After the restarting of the Tomcat/4.0-b1 on Linux Red Hat 7.0, Java 2 (1.3) can
not process dynamic pages (*.jsp, servlets). The user agent just hangs. On the 
secong request behaves normaly.
Actions:
	1. Placed a WAR file wap.war in TOMCAT_HOME/webapps directory
	2. Started Tomcat4 with /etc/rc.d/init.d/tomcat4 start 
	(lines written to catalina.log)
	3. Restarted httpd daemon with /etc/rc.d/init.d/httpd restart
        (lines written to apache_log.txt, applicaton deployed)
	4. Make a request from a User Agent (Mozilla/4.75 [en]) to               
http://localhost/wap/date.jsp
	(nothing to do with wml, context of date.jsp is text/html)
What happens (or not happens):
	1. User agent (Mozilla/4.75 [en]) hangs (no timeout, request need to be
canceled to proceed)
	2. Nothing written to /var/log/httpd/error_log or /var/log/httpd/access_log
	3. Some lines written to catalina.out
	4. Nothing written or compiled to TOMCAT_HOME/work/localhost

Trying:
	When canceling the request in the User Agent (Mozilla/4.75 [en]) and making a
new request, everything seems to work OK.
